Instruction: Drain tofu and crumble into small pieces.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Saut√© onion and garlic until softened.
Add crumbled tofu to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes, breaking it up with a spatula.
Add diced tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, salt, and pepper to the skillet.
Cook for 5-7 minutes, or until tomatoes soften.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
Stir in nutritional yeast and cook for an additional minute.
